RT @RJC Senator @tedcruz on the Israel-UAE deal “It is the result of four years of strong and unequivocal American support for Israel” 
#RJC2020 

You can watch the conversation, live, here: https://www.rjchq.org/rjc_rnc_cruz http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1297673019490537472/img/kJEv3j5Wls7gJoZa.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1297673019490537472/vid/480x270/IeimZUFdiXNigA9R.mp4?tag=13

RT @marklevinshow Antifa targeting a Portland suburb
https://www.dailywire.com/news/leftists-storm-suburb-with-guillotine-burn-american-flags-get-in-the-fing-streets

Beware of false prophets, who come to you in sheep’s clothing, but underneath are ravenous wolves. By their fruits you will know them. Do people pick grapes from thornbushes, or figs from thistles?

Matthew 7:15-16

My anti-corruption bill would close the ridiculous loophole that allows part-time officials to keep their financial disclosures secret. And it would prevent federal officials like Louis DeJoy & the @USPS Board from owning or trading individual stocks. We must #EndCorruptionNow.

The @USPS Board's “full support” of Louis DeJoy’s efforts to delay and degrade mail service raises serious questions about its members' motivations. DeJoy has stock in Amazon & USPS competitors – we should know if the USPS Board has conflicts affecting their actions too.

My staff requested the @USPS Board of Governors' financial disclosure reports to look for conflicts of interest, but they're “not releasable” since they work less than 130 days/year. That’s a dumb loophole. The Board should voluntarily release the reports. https://www.motherjones.com/2020-elections/2020/08/post-office-board-financial-disclosures/

During their pledges last week to ban fracking & raise taxes, Dems failed to address an issue that's become overwhelmingly apparent: its problem w/ law & order.
 
Americans need leaders who will stand with the men & women of law enforcement, not the mob.
https://dailycaller.com/2020/08/20/will-democrats-defend-police-ted-cruz/

RT @ballesteros_312 What happened in Kenosha tonight should lead every TV broadcast in the Midwest and across the country tonight, tomorrow and everyday until something is done. That police officer shot to kill that man in his own car in front of his kids. Pitiful and enraging. Pay attention.

RT @NWSHouston Here are the latest (4AM CDT) updates on both Tropical Storms Marco and Laura. While Marco is closer to SE TX, Laura remains one to watch for in the coming days. Stay tuned! #HurricaneSeason2020 #glswx #houwx #txwx http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgLSJi7U8AACDBX.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgLSJjfUYAEp-os.jpg

The police who shot Jacob Blake in the back seven times must be fired, arrested and prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Congress cannot wait any longer to act forcefully to end the horrific violence against Black Americans at the hands of police.

This is exactly right. #China’s role in the #CoronavirusPandemic has shown us why we need to work toward decoupling our economy from China. That’s why I’ve introduced legislation to bring back critical infrastructure & medical supply chains to the US.
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-china-decoupling/trump-says-could-decouple-and-not-do-business-with-china-idUSKBN25I0S7

Police in Kenosha shot Jacob Blake seven times in the back. His children were watching. I'm holding them all in my heart today and hoping for a full recovery. Police brutality is a daily threat to Black lives. We must demand accountability.

Praying for Jacob Blake, his children, and his family.

It’s not enough to paint slogans. We need systemic change: ending qualified immunity, changing budget priorities, investing in communities harmed by overpolicing, and more.

The solutions are out there. We must act on them.

We cannot accept that our children and grandchildren must face worse fires, worse hurricanes, worse floods and more disasters every year. We must stand up to the fossil fuel industry and end their greed. We must pass a Green New Deal. https://twitter.com/ABC/status/1297813724254949377 QT @ABC First-person video shared by California firefighters gives a glimpse of what it's like to drive through massive wildfire burning south of San Francisco.

More than 14,000 firefighters are battling numerous wildfires raging across the state. https://trib.al/nCmDKbg http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1297672465691414531/img/GZjf12BJQvAL9-H5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1297672465691414531/vid/320x320/5AUAVHy2My_uKAjP.mp4?tag=13

We have again witnessed an unconscionable shooting of a Black man by police.

We pray for Jacob Blake and for his family, and demand that justice be served. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/kenosha-shooting-wisconsin-police-shoot-jacob-blake-black-man-protesters-gather/

"I would shut it down."

This is the Biden economic agenda. Destroy every small business in America. Kill tens of millions more jobs. 

This is madness. https://twitter.com/abc7ny/status/1297712828946800640 QT @ABC7NY 2020 Vote: Biden says he'd shut down economy if scientists recommended https://abc7ny.com/6385227/?ex_cid=TA_WABC_TW&taid=5f431cddf8e35700010c6e88&utm_campaign=trueAnthem:+New+Content+(Feed)&utm_medium=trueAnthem&utm_source=twitter http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgJm8OyXgAAWhDH.jpg

Planned Parenthood Leaders Admit Under Oath to Killing Babies in Illegal Partial-Birth Abortions 

https://www.lifenews.com/2020/08/24/planned-parenthood-leaders-admit-under-oath-to-killing-babies-in-illegal-partial-birth-abortions/

Thirty million don't have enough to eat, 22 million are behind on rent.

It is morally obscene that the American people have to rely on GoFundMe to pay for rent and food.

Mitch McConnell: End your vacation. Pass emergency relief now.
https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/08/23/economy-federal-benefits-low-wage-workers/

My bill to extend and expand the eviction moratorium is ready to go. So is @SenSherrodBrown’s bill for rental assistance. What are you waiting for, @SenateMajLdr McConnell? You can’t just close your eyes and think this problem will go away on its own. https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/20/evictions-are-expected-to-skyrocket-as-protections-expire.html

RT @Ilhan Forever grateful for this sisterhood & the opportunity to discuss the Black maternal crisis. 

Black women are up to 4 times more likely to die from childbirth complications. 

This issue is personal. Thank you @VanityFair for allowing us to highlight this healthcare crisis. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgMmtVJX0AEV9YJ.jpg

The world is rapidly becoming more unhealthy and unsafe right in front of our eyes. If we don't act soon, we will see more devastating fires, more extreme weather disturbances, and massive human suffering. We can't afford to wait any longer. We need the Green New Deal now. https://twitter.com/AFP/status/1296801729892290565 QT @AFP VIDEO: Flames devour houses and fields in Vacaville, California, as a series of massive fires quickly spreads in the north and centre of the US state, forcing more evacuations http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ef7marHXkAcyWEv.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1296722451582406661/vid/480x270/CVEznmWSVUwxab1K.mp4?tag=13

The radical Biden-Harris energy agenda would devastate America’s energy independence, increase energy costs, and destroy blue-collar jobs that rely on a thriving energy sector.
https://thehill.com/opinion/energy-environment/512601-a-biden-harris-presidency-would-largely-end-oil-and-gas-production#.X0P-x7w6Y5o.twitter

These devastating fires in California have already burned more than 1 million acres—and this wildfire season isn’t close to being over.

I’ll say it again: everyone must have a plan in the event of an evacuation order. Have a bag ready and please stay safe.

Trump pressured the @US_FDA to approve a COVID-19 treatment before it's been fully reviewed. This isn’t cutting red tape – it’s strong-arming public health experts for the President's political purposes. FDA actions must be based on science, not politics. https://twitter.com/politico/status/1297606651428642821 QT @politico #BREAKING: The Food and Drug Administration will issue an emergency authorization for blood plasma as a coronavirus treatment, according to three administration officials
https://www.politico.com/news/2020/08/23/plasma-treatment-coronavirus-fda-trump-400390

Jacob Blake should not be fighting for his life right now. 

As @JoeBiden said, there must be an immediate investigation and the officers involved should be held accountable. 

Jacob, our nation is praying for you and your entire family. https://twitter.com/joebiden/status/1297936455986290693 QT @JoeBiden Yesterday, Jacob Blake was shot seven times in the back by police. His kids watched from the car. Today, we woke to grieve yet again.

We need a full and transparent investigation. https://joebiden.com/2020/08/24/statement-by-vice-president-joe-biden-on-the-shooting-of-jacob-blake-in-kenosha-wisconsin/
You mess with the mail, you’re messing with the American people. Period. #DontMessWithUSPS

‼️ICYMI: Sen. Rubio in @NAR: Russian leader a failed puppet master only seeking to enrich himself

https://asia.nikkei.com/Opinion/India-should-ignore-Putin-s-offer-to-broker-accord-with-China
RT @SenMarkey The Senate needs to immediately pass the legislation I introduced with @SenSanders and @SenWarren to abolish qualified immunity for law enforcement officers once and for all.

Great work fighting to #SaveThePostOffice for the people for Massachusetts, @RepStephenLynch. https://twitter.com/MotherJones/status/1297924636793958401 QT @MotherJones Rep. Stephen Lynch (D-Mass.) just hammered Postmaster Dejoy's handling of the USPS.

"Either through gross incompetence you have ended the 240-year history of delivering the mail reliably on time, or, the second conclusion we can gather is, you're doing this on purpose." http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1297921899662434304/img/UmP7CKV___kVIpwc.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1297921899662434304/vid/480x270/7rQBDZe7nE-hsle3.mp4?tag=13

RT @NWSCorpus Long period swells from Tropical Storm Marco will lead to a HIGH risk of rip currents today. Scattered storms are also expected this morning and afternoon. Please exercise extreme caution. Rip currents are difficult to see and can be deadly. #txwx #stxwx http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgL3eMUVAAIrT1G.jpg

Jacob Blake should not be fighting for his life right now. His children should not be traumatized from watching their father being shot repeatedly in the back by police. His family deserves justice. How many names of Black Americans must we say until this stops? https://twitter.com/NBCNews/status/1297954083177930752 QT @NBCNews A Black man was shot in the back multiple times by police in Kenosha, Wisconsin, on Sunday, a bystander's video showed, prompting protests. https://nbcnews.trib.al/gy6p02m

RT @CDCgov If you’re planning to stay with friends or family outside of your household to evacuate from a storm, talk with them about how you all can best protect yourselves from #COVID19. Find more safety tips here: https://www.cdc.gov/disasters/hurricanes/covid-19/prepare-for-hurricane.html. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgHSUQuWoAIUoDQ.jpg

RT @AEI_WTHIGO .@SenTedCruz on @AEI_WTHIGO: "We need to work to decouple our economy from #China and, in particular, to decouple the critical infrastructure, the lifesaving medicines that we need so that we're not vulnerable to the Chinese Communist government."

Listen: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/wth-is-going-on-in-america-sen-ted-cruz-on-george-floyd/id1467993804?i=1000476843565 https://twitter.com/SenTedCruz/status/1297924441591226368 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1297954726194053123/pu/img/oaLLgYJ1EgOmAdFk.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1297954726194053123/pu/vid/320x320/luxPpGRXaSCnzM7Q.mp4?tag=10 QT @SenTedCruz This is exactly right. #China’s role in the #CoronavirusPandemic has shown us why we need to work toward decoupling our economy from China. That’s why I’ve introduced legislation to bring back critical infrastructure & medical supply chains to the US.
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-china-decoupling/trump-says-could-decouple-and-not-do-business-with-china-idUSKBN25I0S7

Louis DeJoy and Donald Trump’s sabotage of the Postal Service is a threat to our democracy. We've got to keep up the pressure—join one of hundreds of #SaveThePostOffice actions across the country tomorrow: http://ewar.ren/save-usps https://twitter.com/APWUnational/status/1297624678777753600 QT @APWUnational LIVE: APWU President calls for nationwide rallies to #SaveThePostOffice Aug. 25 https://actionnetwork.org/event_campaigns/save-the-postal-service-aug-25-day-of-action https://www.pscp.tv/w/chFwxjFKUkVtWW9OZ05uRVB8MVprSnpteVJubWVHdqO3acpsa9KaVuFLXG3TR-DLLm4QWT0qTj5YC_KqITUt

We can and we must make progress to save Black Lives and we can start by enacting the George Floyd #JusticeInPolicing Act, which the House passed more than eight weeks ago. It’s time for the Senate to act.

The prayers of Americans nationwide are with Jacob Blake as he fights for his life following yesterday’s outrageous shooting in Kenosha, WI. We owe it to Jacob, his children, and all Black Americans to bring an end to racial injustice and police brutality.

The fact that Wall Street executives made an obscene $3 billion profit off of the death and destruction of California's raging wildfires shows you just how absurd and cruel casino capitalism has become. We need an economy that works for all, not the 1%. https://www.insurancejournal.com/news/national/2020/08/24/580129.htm

Praying for Jacob Blake’s recovery and for his children. This unconscionable violence against Black Americans at the hands of police must end. We demand systemic change. We demand accountability. We demand justice. https://twitter.com/SarahThamerWISN/status/1297715131745525765 QT @SarahThamerWISN This is 29-year-old Jacob Blake who was shot by Kenosha police. His fiancé shared this picture with us. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgJpByeWsAEf49R.jpg

RT @kylegriffin1 . @AOC: Can we get a commitment from you to submit your calendar dating back to June 16 to this committee?
DEJOY: I don't know. I'll check with counsel. I don't want to set a precedent.
...
AOC: If we cannot receive them voluntarily, I would recommend consideration of a subpoena.

RT @tiffany_caban Make no mistake. The intention is to suppress and criminalize protest. It’s about control, not safety. https://twitter.com/wuwmradio/status/1297959080175325185 QT @WUWMradio The Kenosha County Sheriff’s Department announced an 8 p.m. curfew for the second night in a row Monday. The curfew follows unrest in Kenosha after the police shooting of Jacob Blake Sunday. The curfew will be enforced until 7 a.m. Tuesday. https://www.wuwm.com/post/kenosha-officials-order-curfew-second-night-biden-releases-statement-jacob-blake-shooting#stream/0

RT @vanitaguptaCR WATCH: @AOC asked DeJoy if he'd commit to releasing his calendars.

USPS recently rejected @weareoversight's FOIA request for DeJoy’s calendars, saying the calendars “maintained on a USPS computer” were for DeJoy’s personal use and couldn't be FOIA'd. https://www.americanoversight.org/document/response-from-usps-regarding-request-for-postmaster-general-dejoys-calendars http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1297975728231849984/img/0J4MRTy5CZhfSgIy.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1297975728231849984/vid/480x270/P4TyJk8CB5QS1O7Z.mp4?tag=13

Whether it’s your first day of school at @HowardU or your senior year, capture this moment. Hold it in your heart. This school year may look a little different but know your Bison family will be with you every step of this journey to help you succeed.

RT @CAGoBiz We can help. 

With hundreds of fires burning across our state, we have resources available that can help our business community. 

🔥 http://business.ca.gov 🔥 

Please see the below video sharing the resources; contact us if you would like direct assistance: 1-877-345-4633. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1297913768047910913/pu/img/dNRsEiC5cI-C88KJ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1297913768047910913/pu/vid/320x510/1f3t9sOrl1BWxbFs.mp4?tag=10

Every voter can help to defeat attacks on our voting system by making a plan to vote as early as possible.

The American people should and will choose our next President –  not Vladimir Putin nor the bully tactics from this Administration. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1297993945960546311/pu/img/iq9giBktuSf0yDq4.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1297993945960546311/pu/vid/480x270/nf679Q1cmKdhWSzX.mp4?tag=10

For months, any family in Massachusetts has been able to pick up food for their kids at schools and community sites in their neighborhoods. Ending this policy right now means kids will go hungry. The @USDA must reverse this cruel decision. https://twitter.com/EdLaborCmte/status/1296535262357487616 QT @EdLaborCmte 🚨BREAKING🚨
 
The @USDA says it will NOT extend waivers that allow states and schools to more easily serve school meals during #COVID19.
 
The waivers will expire in 9 days. 

This is a major blow to the fight against child hunger. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ef43cVoXgAAuEnn.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ef43eTZXsAcrZwh.jpg

Too many in the media are fully committed to tearing down America. This “journalist” claims the United States is worse than Nazi Germany. 

That slander is objectively false, absurd, and grossly disrespectful to the 6 million Jews murdered in the Holocaust. https://twitter.com/jemelehill/status/1297633435377270785 QT @jemelehill Been reading Isabel Wilkerson’s new book, “Caste,” and if you were of the opinion that the United States wasn’t nearly as bad as Nazi Germany, how wrong you are. Can’t encourage you enough to read this masterpiece.
(📸: Kennedi Carter)

These women are my lifeline. I wouldn’t have been able to survive this first term without their sisterhood.

Thank you @VanityFair for giving us & 22 activists space to champion Black maternal health, housing, civil rights and economic justice for all. https://www.vanityfair.com/culture/2020/08/black-lives-matter-activists-photos http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgNzBhnWsAUDl85.jpg

I agree with @RepPressley: change at the @USPS can’t wait. #SaveThePostOffice https://twitter.com/RepPressley/status/1297990593856131077 QT @RepPressley The only thing Postmaster General DeJoy should be delivering is his resignation. 

My full line of questioning from today's @OversightDems hearing ⬇️ http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1297989054152220676/img/TZOTqfAZMjLE_K18.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1297989054152220676/vid/480x270/wPhVXEJ8fbdzUTs4.mp4?tag=13

RT @RepKatiePorter It's bad enough the Postmaster General doesn't know the basics of his agency. But to laugh off his ignorance?

This isn't a joke for the millions of Americans who rely on USPS. http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/EgNsetyXkAEy6fH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/EgNsetyXkAEy6fH.mp4

The federal eviction moratorium Congress passed in our last #COVID19 relief package has expired—starting today, millions face eviction. Congress must immediately get back to work & pass legislation to protect these Americans and their families. https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/08/23/economy-federal-benefits-low-wage-workers/#comments-wrapper

.@realDonaldTrump is right. In June on @AEI_WTHIGO w/ @DPletka & @MarcThiessen, I said it’s unacceptable that American lives are dependent on the whim & discretion of the CCP & that we need to decouple our economy from China. I've introduced legislation to do just that. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1298028196345020416/img/5UyjQ2jbtJzIEcVf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1298028196345020416/vid/320x320/7uQ7wN3zuxG5JkG1.mp4?tag=13

The Postmaster General needs to resign or be removed from office now. We need a Postmaster General who will work overtime to ensure the prompt delivery of mail—not a top Trump campaign contributor who is undermining the Postal Service and slowing down the mail.

DeJoy must go. https://twitter.com/StarTribune/status/1297944760716410880 QT @StarTribune Postmaster General Louis DeJoy refused requests by Democrats on Monday to restore mail-sorting machines. https://www.startribune.com/postal-chief-returns-to-congress-facing-uproar-over-delays/572202192/

Trillions of dollars are being used to bolster the Stock Market. America must take steps to support hardworking families nationwide as well. #FamiliesFirst #MSNBCLive http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgOFIhwXoAUowOD.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1298025357220732928/vid/480x270/VqTLSBaWSr1QWESZ.mp4?tag=13

Americans deserve leaders in the White House who see them and take their concerns seriously. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgODeHeXoAEJCH3.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1298022080827596805/vid/320x320/YGU6VprwU-Avjxdh.mp4?tag=13

RT @ReadyHarris #Laura is still a threat to our area. Prepare your family and homes now. Make sure your emergency kits are stocked, vehicles are fueled and your family emergency plan is ready. https://twitter.com/NHC_Atlantic/status/1297910117816401925 QT @NHC_Atlantic 11 am EDT Monday, August 24 Key Messages for Tropical Storm #Laura: There is an increasing risk of dangerous storm surge, wind, and rainfall impacts from the upper Texas coast to the north-central Gulf coast beginning Wednesday. http://nhc.noaa.gov/#Laura http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgMaTALUYAIIOBC.png

There are common sense steps we can & must take to mitigate the spread of #COVID19 – but we can do that w/o keeping our country shutdown. We must focus on getting Americans safely back to work & our kids safely back to school. That’s exactly what I’m working to do in the Senate.
What Joe Biden doesn’t seem to understand: the consequences of keeping our country shut down are serious and dire. https://www.wsj.com/articles/bidens-lockdown-mistake-11598218830

Republicans haven’t just enabled Donald Trump's erosion of our values and democracy, they've actively participated in it. We don't need a Republican National Convention to show us who they are—they've shown us every day for the last four years.

Want to learn a bit about how I prep for hearings? Check out my IG stories 🤗 https://twitter.com/amandalitman/status/1298034500157530112 QT @amandalitman I know it’s unnecessary to say “watch @AOC’s Insta story” but srsly watch how she preps for hearings. She *can* do this b/c she doesn’t have to fundraise, &, she *has* to do this b/c opponents will jump at any chance to criticize her. Either way: She does the damn thing.👑👑 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgOLfyCWkAItiCT.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgOLfyEXkAA2yOd.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgOLfzHXgAAhsAE.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgOLf4QWAAAdtOW.jpg

Millions of people across America have lost their income and are now facing eviction and financial ruin, all while struggling to put food on the table and staying alive during a pandemic.

Congress must step up to provide relief—immediately.   https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/08/23/economy-federal-benefits-low-wage-workers/?hpid=hp_hp-top-table-main_economymargins-545pm%3Ahomepage%2Fstory-ans

No national strategic plan to stop the #coronavirus

No plan to open up schools – safely
 
Lapsed unemployment benefits
 
Families face hunger & eviction

House Dems put #FamiliesFirst with solutions to this suffering. Trump and his enabler #MoscowMitch proudly stand in the way. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1298036510403461121/pu/img/ldKmXlSniIPn3D0O.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1298036510403461121/pu/vid/480x270/NiEcuWg1E0mhYuur.mp4?tag=10

This is not just an election on the issues. This is an election on the future of American democracy. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgOL3z6X0AEw_Xa.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1298031399979622400/vid/320x320/Kvmuy3gJJtq6Pg5C.mp4?tag=13
@jilly_peppa 💞
@disabledfoodie @RBReich I got you! 💪🏽💜

In the middle of a pandemic, historic economic downturn, and double-digit unemployment, the Republican National Convention decided there’s no need for an agenda – for the people.  

So there’s no 2020 Republican Party Platform; only a pledge of allegiance to Donald Trump.

RT @TeamJoe America’s educators shape our children’s future and their pay should reflect that – especially during a pandemic. Teachers deserve a president like @JoeBiden who understands the importance of their work.
